About Me

Who am I?

Bio:

About to study “Technology of Multi-media” in the Institute of Technology of Las Americas (ITLA), and a long-time avid artist and tech enthusiast born in Dominican Republic and raised in the United States. I’m a 20 year old freelance artist, front-end web developer, video editor that dabbles with Youtube content creation and social media.

Illustration and Digital Content Creation

Software Proficiency:

Adobe Photoshop, Clip Studio Paint, Paint Tool Sai, Adobe Illustrator, Sony Vegas Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Blender3D

Skills:

Character and portrait art, environment art, color correction, compositorial and media design video editing, simple special effects, and basic animation.

Front-end Web Development and Design

Software/Language Proficiency:

HTML5, CSS3, Javascript/JQuery, Node.js, Vue.js, Python, SASS, Wordpress, Git, Adobe XD, and Balsamiq

Skills:

App and Website mock-up & prototyping, color design, responsive design, performance improvement, dynamic website and app creation, and live website deployment.
